channel.title: CVE Feed for powr -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for powr -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-5741|2024-08-02T08:07:32.623Z -- powr -- contact%20form%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20builder%2C%20payment%20form%2C%20and%20more
item.description: The POWR plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's 'powr-powr-pack' shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.0 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with contributor-level and above permissions to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
